item.title: An introduction to data science using R

item.title: Course material
item.description: The complete course material Session Date Topic Slides 1 March 12, 2022 General introduction Slides Orga, Slides Philo 2 March 23, 2022 Installation Slides 3 March 24, 2022 First steps in R I Slides 4 March 31, 2022 First steps in R II Slides 5 April 6, 2022 Visualization I TBD 6 April 7, 2022 Data wrangling I TBD 7 April 20, 2022 R Markdown TBD 8 April 21, 2022 Projects and workflow TBD 9 April 28, 2022 Taking stock TBD Session 1: Introduction Slides for the organizational part Slides for the philosophical part Session 2: Installation Slides Tutorial: installing and accessing the exercises Session 3: First steps in R I - Basics and functions Slides Mandatory readings Tutorial: Commands, objects, and assignments
